title: Custom Scanning Application for iOS
desc: We are a retail company with a large amount of product that need to be cataloged.  We are looking for an iOS application that multiple people can use to help catalog the products by scanning the barcode to retrieve the UPC, and entering the associated price. Please note that we are using other applications to do this presently, but these other iOS tools come with many other features and stuff that make the process slow and costly.  The bottom line is that we want to streamline the process by allowing our team to scan, enter the price, and move on without having to worry about anything else.We need someone efficient and relatively creative who is capable of; while seeing only the starting data and final result, find the best path to accomplish the goal in a simple fashion.From the viewing side, there are just 4 'screens'/'phases' (apologies, I have no idea what to call this) that will be required for this application:1. Menu - when the app is launched, users will come to the 'welcome page', if you will.  Here, they can choose to Start Scanning(takes user to page 2), End Scanning or Export(note: Start Scanning, End Scanning will be used as sort of dividers to recognize what date to export when the time comes to do so, so that the application doesn't export all of the UPCs and Prices it's ever scanned.  If you can come up with a better, simpler way to accomplish this, please do.2. Scanning - literally camera view: Hold the camera up to the barcode, it scans the barcode and retains the UPC (barcode number).  (As soon as it registers the barcode and saves the UPC, it will take the user to page 3.3. Price Input - Just a keypad like you'd see on a phone with 12 buttons.  1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0, Return to Menu, and a "last used price"(e.g. scan an item, it's $2.5.  The next item you scan is also $2.5, so you can just hit this button) button would be great as well.4. Export - I don't know exactly what this will look like, and I don't care.  We just need a way to get all of the UPCs with their associated prices in/on a chart somewhere else.  That can mean making a list of all the UPCs and prices that someone can copy/paste into an email, or automatically entering the UPCs and prices into an internal spreadsheet while scanning, or any other awesome way you can think of doing it.  As long as it's simple and works.

title: Android Mobile Raffle / Auction App
desc: ***PLEASE READ AND THEN BID.. PLEASE DO *NOT* BID ANY AMOUNT EXCEPT FOR THE AMOUNT THAT THIS WILL COST TO MAKE.   THANK YOU!Android App only at the moment. Eventually I will add IOS app, but that will be separate project and has nothing to do with this bid.Ok, I had issues with posting a project and people bidding 1 amount and then saying another amount.  I will only pay the amount you bid for the app to be created and bug free. I know bugs happen and I want to make sure that bugs will be fixed and the price is worked into the bid.I will pay extra without issue for any  additional features, changes etc that I request after the requested app is built and complete. (example. after I receive app , I decide I want to change something a month down the road....Details:Android App . I would like it designed and built. I found a nice concept on Google play. It's kind of an auction type site. There's only a couple of apps that use this type auction type system. You buy credit (PayPal seems to be what people use) and you buy shares / tickets to try to win that item. Say there's a 50 Amazon gf. It would be listed, it would have say 65 tickets available. Once can you buy credit you can you can buy as many "shares" (basically raffle tickets) as you want. So say I bought 5 tickets for 5.00, the listing would then show 60 of 65 tickets available when I bought those tickets it would then show five random ticket numbers between say 10000 and 10065. When all the tickets Sal and the system is using a formula would generate a winning ticket number and whoever purchased that ticket would show up as the winner. (Example goraffle and the one I like best (Onederbuy (was named wonder buy). There existing ones are based out of China but I would like to do the first usa-1 it can be just like onederbuy as possible . I imagine that app can be extracted and you can see how it works. Ready to award within 24 hours. I asked that you only bid if you are positive you can make / duplicate something like onederbuy app. Some things you cannot see on app that will need to be done is a backend so that I can add/remove/change products and set ticket amount required before the winning number is generated.... Add, remove, change products on lucky wheel, create, modify coupon system  and set the ticket amount required,  some type of printable report so I can view winners. User management option and whatever else you feel is needed to make the app full function able like the onederbuy app. When someone wins, the system automatically  sends them push notification and a confirmation email.  Once I award , I can provide a few dollars so that you can try app and see how it functions. I pretty much want it like onderbuy but obviously different name and a little different layout so that its not exactly the same. Please email will any questions that may effect the amount you bid.  I will look at everyones profiles and award to whom I feel is the best person for the job. I may or may not contact you before awarding, so please bid the amount it will cost to create an app just like onderbuy (or go raffle but with a lucky wheel).I have attached the apk as I know some places cant download it. I also extracted the apk and provided those files also.Thank you for your understanding on bidding the amount to create the app. it will end up turning into extra money do to updates and changes.  I just don't want someone to bid 100 and then say oh it will be 1200 after I award it because I will have to leave neg feedback. I look forward to all your bids and working with you!Once complete, I plan to market and eventually add an IOS app, but that is down the line.

title: Dev Android
desc: Development TasksI have some tasks to finish, I was able to analyze and send me a budget. you can do it?link google play APK Motop[url removed, login to view]- SearchSet the search to stay smarter. Today if the user searches for "pocket" the app does not bring any results in the search, in this case should bring in the search result all pockets close to the user.In the demo APK even when I search for information that is in the POI address, the result appears in the search. Maybe it's just setting setting.- Change sharing button text (it is in the property detail screen).We need to replace text that appears in the message that the user shares with others.currentlySubject (when shared via email): The CityMessage:"View good place 'General Motorbikes'Located at: General Osório Street, 529Using app 'Motop' "How to staySubject: MotopMessage:"Meet 'General Motos' located in General Osório Street, 529.Find parking pockets, motorhomes, workshops, rubber shops and motorcycle clubs using Motop[url removed, login to view] "- Firebase SDKInstallation and configuration of App Indexing and Crash Reporting functions.Adjust settings to send notifications via the Firebase Console, not through the app admin panel.- Crashes / BugsFix bugs listed below.IllegalStateException (@Fragment: getResources: 646) {main}NullPointerException (@ ActivitySplash $ 3: onResponse: 106) {main}- Loading informationSet up the app to gradually download information from pockets, motorcycle parts, workshops, rubber shops and motorcycle clubs. I believe the app already has something with a function for it or similar, maybe it's just a matter of setting and / or configuring the parameters.- Delete phone and website fieldsPockets will not have phone number or url for a website, so when the user enters the details of a pocket we must show all fields except phone and website.The ideal would be to make a condition for all POIs:If there is a phone (or website) it shows the information in the detail screen of the POI, if it does not have this information in the database, do not show the fields in the detail screen of the POI.We can not include in the database pockets without phone and website, so in all of them you will find a hyphen (-) in these fields. If you touch website will open the chrome and give error, if clicking on the phone will not have a number to call.We also have many drills that do not have a website, just a phone. In that case the only field that would not appear on the POI detail screen would be the site.If you have any questions, you can call me right away. If you find it necessary we can make another call explaining in detail each of the points listed above.A hug,

title: Develop a working prototype for an ASL Translator Bracelet
desc: Hello, I need a hardware engineer and a software developer to create a working prototype for an ASL translator bracelet. The idea is to have a deaf person wear the bracelet, and as the person signs ASL with his hands the bracelet will be able to recognize the gestures of each ASL word or letter and have it translated to speech via the bracelet (and of course speakers in the bracelet). If the person is holding a conversation with a speech person, Then the bracelet will display the words of the other person in text in a small screen in the bracelet.

It currently does single upload only._App does not detect changes in permissions from Facebook for facebook login: [url removed, login to view] It needs to re-prompt users in case they are not giving over their email address (our system is email address based)._small registration link which brings you onto the URL for registration._Once App gets the reply from plugin that Facebook ID does not exist, it should automatically launch the facebook registration URL and then automatically launch the FB registration via the app._Update Logo when someone sends a push_Make it so that it locks the user from seeing anything but the login screen._Get rid of bug that logs in hundreds of time the same user (if the app cannot plant cookies for some reason)._Stop the app from crashing (the top disappears at some points)_Facebook Login/registration necessitates a login into Facebook again. No need for that since the user is logged in Facebook app normally (if user creates a new registration and uses Facebook registration/login)._When a person clicks on a link inside the app, it opens the respective link outside the app, however any links inside the app now open the link you have opened beforehand as well. Here is how to try it out: Open a link that has been posted inside the app ( see this event: [url removed, login to view] ) and open the link in the description. Now close the Browser that has opened. Click on any tiles/links inside the app. The browser will always open...__small registration button on LOGIN screen (link) which brings you onto the URL for registration -> this needs to be a button that brings you to a link in the webview " /cb-registration "_Addition of further cities: In essence, we need a simple way to change all URL links inside the app (not inside the webview) to a new value (eg: [url removed, login to view] to [url removed, login to view]). Our programmer needs to be able to simply and quickly add new cities.Please note that this app is very easily built up. title: Build windows application based on VOIP techonology.
desc: I am going to build window application using c# or c.The main core is to calling and receiving function.This system has three type of people.One is caller.Second is operator(middle person)Last one is receiver.Let me explain about logic.The caller calls number to operator on mobile phone.The operator receive incoming calls on windows app(i am going to develop this app).Then the operator patch this call to specific user ( last one receiver)Finally , caller and receiver can talk each other via mobile phone
